about_the_game:
Welcome to a world of sorcerers, swordplay, and puzzle solving. You are Kit, a young adventurer intent on saving the Realm. As the wizard Namrid's apprentice, it is up to you to thwart monsters and master your battle skills. Your travels will take you through dangerous dungeons and lead you to encounters with eccentric characters . With your trusty shield Gallad, you will face down the ultimate evil threatening your world.

Gameplay Features

  • Meet fun and interesting non-playable characters
  • Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, and battle dungeon bosses

  • Wage battle against enemy types of varying difficulty and skillsets

    Combat System Features

    Includes talking shield, crossbow with magical arrows and more...
    • Dodge & Parry attack

    • Magical Hammer

    • Grapple Hook with Semi-auto Aim

    • Sword and Shield with optional auto target
